tip.text: You can enable Parallel Builds in Project properties

item.name: EditEscape
item.tip: Focuses the current editor or, if the editor is already focused, hides the bottom dock

item.name: EditIncreaseTextSize
item.tip: Increases the size of the text in the currently focused window

item.name: EditRestoreTextSize
item.tip: Restores the size of the text to the default text size

item.name: EditDecreaseTextSize
item.tip: Decreases the size of the text in the currently focused window

item.name: ScriptRun
item.tip: Runs the script in the active editor

item.name: JavaScriptStopScript
item.tip: Stop JavaScript

item.name: EditorNext
item.tip: Activate Next Editor

item.name: EditorPrev
item.tip: Activate Previous Editor

item.name: EditorNextTab
item.tip: Activate Next Tab

item.name: EditorPrevTab
item.tip: Activate Previous Tab

item.name: WindowNext
item.tip: Activate Next Window

item.name: WindowPrev
item.tip: Activate Previous Window

item.name: WindowResetLayout
item.tip: Restores the default window layout for the active perspective

item.name: WindowSwitchPrev
item.tip: Switch to Previous Window

item.name: WindowCloseTab
item.tip: Close the active window

item.name: WindowCloseFocused
item.tip: Close the active window

item.name: WindowCloseAll
item.tip: Close all document windows

item.name: WindowCloseAllUnedited
item.tip: Close All Unedited Documents

item.name: WindowCloseOtherWindows
item.tip: Close all but the active document window

item.name: WindowCloseWindowsLeft
item.tip: Close all windows to the left of this window

item.name: WindowCloseWindowsRight
item.tip: Close all windows to the right of this window

item.name: WindowSortAlphabetically
item.tip: Sorts the tabs into alphabetical order

item.name: WindowNewHorizontalTabGroup
item.tip: New Horizontal Tab Group

item.name: DebugDownloadActive
item.tip: Loads the active project onto the target

item.name: Debug.StartActive
item.tip: Loads the active project onto the target and runs it under the debugger

item.name: DebugStepIntoActive
item.tip: Loads the active project onto the target, runs it under the debugger, and stops at the first instruction

item.name: DebugResetActive
item.tip: Resets the target without loading the active project and starts debugging

item.name: DebugAttachActive
item.tip: Attach debugger to the active project running on the target

item.name: DebugExecuteActive
item.tip: Loads the selected project onto the target and runs it without the debugger

item.name: DebugVerifyActive
item.tip: Verifies that the active project has been downloaded correctly onto the target

item.name: DebugStart
item.tip: Loads the selected project onto the target and runs it under the debugger

item.name: DebugStepIntoSelected
item.tip: Loads the selected project onto the target, runs it under the debugger, and stops at the first instruction

item.name: DebugReset
item.tip: Resets the target without loading the selected project and starts debugging

item.name: DebugAttach
item.tip: Attach debugger to the selected project running on the target

item.name: DebugExecute
item.tip: Start Without Debugging

item.name: DebugVerify
item.tip: Verifies that the selected project has been downloaded correctly onto the target

item.name: Debug.Go
item.tip: Start Execution

item.name: Debug.Continue
item.tip: Continue Execution

item.name: Debug.RunToMain
item.tip: Start execution and run to main()

item.name: Debug.Restart
item.tip: Restart Debugging

item.name: Debug.SwitchDebugMode
item.tip: Switch between debugging at source level and assembly language level

item.name: Debug.Break
item.tip: Break Execution

item.name: Debug.Stop
item.tip: Stop Debugging

item.name: DebugEditFileSearchPaths
item.tip: Search Paths

item.name: DebugLoadSymbols
item.tip: Load Symbols

item.name: DebugUnLoadSymbols
item.tip: Unloads symbols

item.name: Debug.SetNextStatement
item.tip: Sets the instruction pointer to the line containing the cursor

item.name: DebugAddToWatch
item.tip: Add the selected item from the current watch window

item.name: DebugDeleteWatch
item.tip: Remove the selected item from the current watch window

item.name: DebugQuickWatch
item.tip: Evaluates and displays the value of a variable or expression

item.name: DebugToggleMode
item.tip: Switches the debugging mode between Source and Interleaved

item.name: DebugLocate
item.tip: Locate

item.name: DebugSetToZero
item.tip: Sets the selected data item to zero

item.name: DebugSetToOne
item.tip: Sets the selected data item to one

item.name: DebugIncrement
item.tip: Increments the selected data item by one

item.name: DebugDecrement
item.tip: Decrements the selected data item by one

item.name: DebugNegate
item.tip: Negates the selected data item

item.name: DebugInvert
item.tip: Inverts the selected data item

item.name: BreakpointProperties
item.tip: Display the breakpoint properties in the Properties Window

item.name: BreakpointDelete
item.tip: Deletes selected breakpoint

item.name: BreakpointDeleteAll
item.tip: Clears all breakpoints

item.name: BreakpointDisableAll
item.tip: Disables all breakpoints

item.name: BreakpointEnableAll
item.tip: Enables all breakpoints

item.name: BreakpointToggle
item.tip: Insert or remove a breakpoint

item.name: BreakpointToggleEnable
item.tip: Enables or disables a breakpoint

item.name: BreakpointGoToNext
item.tip: Next Breakpoint

item.name: BreakpointGoToPrev
item.tip: Previous Breakpoint

item.name: BreakpointNewSourceCodeBreakpoint
item.tip: Creates a new breakpoint on a source line of a file

item.name: BreakpointNewFunctionBreakpoint
item.tip: Creates a new breakpoint on the function

item.name: BreakpointNewDataBreakpoint
item.tip: Creates a new data breakpoint

item.name: BreakpointNewGroup
item.tip: Creates a new breakpoint group

item.name: BreakpointDeleteGroup
item.tip: Deletes a breakpoint group

item.name: BreakpointDisableGroup
item.tip: Disables all breakpoints in the selected group

item.name: BreakpointEnableGroup
item.tip: Enables all breakpoints in the selected group

item.name: DebugStartOzone
item.tip: Debug current executable using Ozone.

item.name: SetExpressionBreakpoint
item.tip: Set a breakpoint on the expression

item.tip: Mark conflicted items as resolved

item.tip: Commit items to source control

item.name: TargetProperties
item.tip: Displays the properties of the selected target interface

item.name: TargetConnectSelected
item.tip: Connects to the selected target interface

item.name: TargetDisconnectSelected
item.tip: Disconnects from the selected target interface

item.name: TargetDisconnectConnected
item.tip: Disconnects the connected target interface

item.name: TargetReconnectSelected
item.tip: Reconnects to the selected target interface

item.name: TargetReconnectConnected
item.tip: Reconnects to the connected target interface

item.name: TargetResetSelected
item.tip: Resets the selected target interface

item.name: TargetResetConnected
item.tip: Resets the connected target interface

item.name: EraseAllConnected
item.tip: Erase all non-volatile memory through the connected target interface

item.name: EraseMemoryRangeConnected
item.tip: Erase range of non-volatile memory through the connected target interface

item.name: BlankCheckAllConnected
item.tip: Blank check all non-volatile memory through the connected target interface

item.name: LockAllConnected
item.tip: Lock all non-volatile memory through the connected target interface

item.tip: Lock range of non-volatile memory through the connected target interface

item.tip: Unlock all non-volatile memory through the connected target interface

item.name: UnlockMemoryRangeConnected
item.tip: Unlock range of non-volatile memory through the connected target interface

item.name: TargetUploadConnected
item.tip: Upload range of memory through the connected target interface

item.tip: Find devices on selected target interface

item.tip: Copy the full path of the file to the clipboard

item.name: link_include_standard_libraries
item.long: Specifies whether the standard libraries should be linked into your application

item.name: link_standard_libraries_directory
item.long: Specifies where to find the standard libraries

item.name: link_use_multi_threaded_libraries
item.long: Specifies whether to use thread safe standard libraries

item.name: link_symbol_definitions
item.long: Specifies one or more linker symbol definitions

item.name: linker_keep_symbols
item.long: Specifies the symbols that should be kept by the linker even if they are not reachable

item.name: messages.studio
item.cant_find_header: Can't find partner header or source file.
